Issue.creator: bstasyszyn
Issue.summary: Discovery client should provide full set of endorsers in filter
Issue.description: Currently the PrioritySelector only provides two endorsers at a time (ExclusionFilter provides only one) and this is not enough information for some types of prioritization algorithms. For example, the Go SDK added a filter based on block height threshold (see FABG-755). This filter calculates the highest block height of the full set of endorsers and prioritizes the endorsers that are within a certain threshold of that block height.
